Shopify Annotations Section

Learn how to create an Annotations section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description

The Annotations section in Shopify's Sections Pro app is a customizable section that allows you to add annotations to your Shopify store. Annotations are textual notes that provide additional information about a particular area or feature of your website. These are useful for highlighting special features, explaining complex items, offering tips, and much more. This section provides a lot of flexibility with customizable fonts, colors, sizes, headings, and content. You can also adjust the position of the annotation.

Demo

Sample Use Cases

  1. E-commerce Store: Use annotations to highlight specific product features or to provide additional details about a product that might not be immediately obvious from the product image or title.
  2. Fashion Store: Use annotations to highlight the special details of a design, explain the inspiration behind an outfit, or mention certain care instructions.
  3. Electronics Store: Use annotations to explain complex features of an electronic product, highlight certain specifications, or suggest complementary accessories.

Configuration

The configuration is split into various settings mostly focusing on the appearance of annotations. Some of the adjustments that can be made include:

  • Font Settings: This includes whether to override the default theme fonts, font size, line height, and color for both the headline and text.
  • Color Settings: The background color setting allows you to choose the color of the background for the section.
  • Dimension Settings: Allows you to adjust the maximum width of the section, grid gap, padding, and element spacing. There is also a setting to change the way the section is displayed.
  • Caption Settings: This includes adjustment of the caption text size.
  • Content Settings: This is where you upload an image for the section, provide a headline, and add a description. There is also a setting to show buttons which once enabled will let you customize the button's text, link, and style.
  • Annotation Settings: The Annotations block allows customization of each annotation. This includes text size, color, background color, its position, and link. Each block will represent one annotation.

Configure the above settings as per the need for your store and create a store that captures the attention of all your visitors through these annotations.
